title: Coronavirus: How To Make An Exit
description: For the good of public health, it's important that we continue staying in quarantine at least for the next month or two. But, eventually, we will have to leave our homes. On this episode, Kate and Luigi debate the economic implications and strategies for how we exit shelter in place.
author: uchicagopodcasts@gmail.com (University of Chicago Podcast Network)
